competitions.game_description: Valorant is a tactical first-person shooter from Riot Games that combines precise gunplay with unique character abilities. Players engage in strategic, team-based matches where they must complete objectives and outsmart opponents to win.

team_achievements.achievement: Champions of the regional Valorant Showdown

competitions.game_description: Mobile Legends is a popular multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA) game where players control unique heroes to engage in strategic 5v5 battles.

team_achievements.achievement: Champions of the National Mobile Legends Tournament
Runner-up of the Southeast Asia Mobile Legends Championship
Semifinalists at the Global Mobile Legends Cup

competitions.game_description: League of Legends is a multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA) where teams of powerful champions, each with unique abilities, battle to control strategic areas and destroy the enemy's base.

team_achievements.achievement: Champions of the National League of Legends Tournament
Semifinalists at the Global League of Legends Championship
Finalists of the League of Legends Invitational

competitions.game_description: Call of Duty is a first-person shooter franchise where players engage in fast-paced combat across a variety of game modes, focusing on tactical teamwork and sharp reflexes.

team_achievements.achievement: Champions of the International Call of Duty Tournament
Runner-up at the National Call of Duty Championship
Semifinalists of the Global Call of Duty Masters

competitions.game_description: Dota 2 is a competitive online battle arena where two teams of five players each compete to destroy the other's base, requiring strategy and teamwork.

team_achievements.achievement: Runner-up at the Dota 2 Global Series
Finalists of the International Dota 2 Cup

competitions.game_description: Fortnite is a battle royale game where players fight to be the last one standing while building structures to defend against opponents.

team_achievements.achievement: Runner-up at the Global Fortnite Championship
Semifinalists at the National Fortnite Tournament
